synopsis.text: Ninja-in-training Shinobu and ordinary high schooler Kaede find themselves in an unlikely friendship after a peculiar encounter. As Kaede diligently studies for her exams, Shinobu, tasked with an unconventional ninja exam, attempts to steal Kaede's underwear. The bizarre exam requirement leads to an unexpected bond between the two girls, as Kaede is drawn into Shinobu's world of partying ninjas and their eccentric master, Onsokumaru. This peculiar yellow, Pac-Man-like creature claims to be the master of all ninjas, guiding Shinobu through her unorthodox training. Join Kaede and Shinobu in this comedic and heartwarming tale that blends modern life with ancient ninja traditions.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
